markdownRemark.html:
Getting Started

The React sample supports running in all JSS application modes. For example, to start the app in disconnected mode, run jss start to build the app and open a browser to view it.

frontmatter.title: Using React.js with Sitecore
frontmatter.description: A practical sample that demonstrates many patterns of how to use JSS with React. It is designed to have just enough dependencies that Sitecore features can function.

frontmatter.title: Building a Blog with Next.js and ButterCMS
